subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City defeated the defending champion, Manchester United, 1-0, yesterday, giving Sven-Goran Eriksson his third shutout in three games as a manager in the English Premier League. Geovanni, one of Eriksson’s eight preseason signings, scored the winning goal in the 31st minute. City leads the league with 9 points, 2 more than Chelsea.
